resources.string:
Need write access to external storage for saving your input of seizure data.
This App do not save any personal information.

Need access to the internet for checking for updates.
This App do not distribute any personal information.

Need access to install updates of this app.
This App do not install other apps except itself when it is updating.
Unassigned files with entries for epileptic seizures exist.\n \n Do you want to assign them to the new user profile?
A new update is available.\n \n Do you want to download and install it?
I thank my girlfriend for the inspiration and the concept of this app because she has epilepsy herself.

string-array.name: bfList_252
string-array.item: Bugfixes\n — Crash while creating a new user entry after reinstallation\n
Changes\n — Background changed from violet to white\n

string-array.name: bfList_251
string-array.item:
Bugfixes
 — medication was not transferred to editor in seizure entry
 — content after commas in notes was not saved correctly
New Features\n — Swipe gesture to access diary and diagrams\n
